text: Enzo Ceragioli (October 1, 1908, Seravezza - June 10, 1999, MilanEnciclopedia della radio, Peppino Ortoleva, Barbara Scaramucci, Garzanti, year 2003, page 160; see Google books) was an Italian conductor, composer, arranger, and pianist. == References == Category:Italian composers Category:Italian male conductors (music) Category:Italian pianists Category:20th-century Italian conductors (music) Category:20th-century Italian male musicians Category:1908 births Category:1999 deaths
title: Enzo Ceragioli
